extendedInfo.description: ââ CRASH BUG SOLVED FOR SAMSUNG GALAXY ACE!ââ           - - - - -Are you a super fan of diamond or gem games (Bejeweled, Diamond Dash, Jewels Deluxe, Jewels Link, Jewels, Jewels Maze!, etc.)? Try Tap Diamond, the best finger-tapping gem elimination games on Android Market!Are you tired of the classical gem swapping games like Bejeweled, Jewels Deluxe, Jewels, etc.?Try Tap Diamond, brand new style of gem game brings more fun and joy!âHow to play?â1.Tap group of 3 or more same colored gems to clear them.2.Tap fast to fill the energy bar and get special diamonds!3.Tap fast for big combo bonuses.4.Game lasts for 60 seconds.5.Every 8 minutes will retrieve one life or you can purchase lives in the shop.âHighlighted Featuresâ1. Well-designed background and user interface.2. More special diamonds with super power available in the shop.3. See highscores on Global Leaderboard and try to beat them!4. Challenge your friends on Facebook and compete in Weekly Tournaments5. Play with friends and get help!6. Regular updates with new featuresââ Try this thrilling and super addictive gem game today !ââ

reviews.title: Facebook user
reviews.comment: Wont work when you sign into facebook!  please fix.  freezes my phone.  will rate higher when fixed!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Seriously?
reviews.comment: I installed this game yesterday and played with no problems at all until I tried playing it today. It no longer keeps score even after going through Facebook to play it. When a level is complete, it does take a life and everything but once you go back in again, nothing is saved and you\'re put back at level 1.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: I like it
reviews.comment: All works fine for me, i am level 12 and so love that it is a short game, and that i cant just keep playing for hours!!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: i didnt get my feint..why?i get nothing when i unlock each task..!

reviews.title: Angry!
reviews.comment: I was lvl 84 wif abt 2000coins..and nw suddenly become lvl1 wif 0coins!! N i keep playing n still lvl 1..wtf!!!! App deleted.

reviews.title: Purchased coins and didn\'t get them...
reviews.comment: I am upset that i purchased coins and the app froze and i never got my coins or my money back. Please fix.

reviews.comment: would be more if it didnt freeze when loging in or out of facebook and if all my extra life didn\'t just go anyway when i got logged out of facebook. I had 400 ex life and now i have 0. And it keeps freezing when i try to get my gifts.

reviews.comment: Dear tap diamond,Its a bit like diamond dash... To be exect.. It is alot like diamond dash!!!! And the screen is so small so ita hard to play... And when you get to your 12 seconds. The sound is really irretating.. Thats when i start to panic.. Uninstall

reviews.comment: Score is always 0 even after getting over 300,000 , i want them to make Diamond Dash for Android!!!! I am so mad!!!!

reviews.comment: Keeps force closing and taking my turn, started me all the the way back to round 1 after logging into and back out of fb... Ugh  plz fix..

reviews.title: Tap diamond
reviews.comment: This game is off da hook i love it its fun as well
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: What a joke
reviews.comment: After reaching level 43 I can no longer level up, I play endless games and never have lives taken away nor does the game show my progress in order to level up. Every time I play a round the game gives me a coin but again does not level me up or take lives from me, I\'m frustrated to say the least, I wouldn\'t recommend this game to anyone, not even my worst enemy, its a joke n needs to be deleted
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Doesn\'t work on my phone. Freezes and have to restart

reviews.comment: Crashes everytime I try to turn annoying sound off & also half way through game if I have sound left on!\tSince last update to this its useless! Please fix it or ill have to remove it for good because it no longer works without constantly freezing!
